title: Cybersecurity Strategy Development and Update
objective: To develop a comprehensive cybersecurity strategy that aligns with the latest industry standards and risk assessments, ensuring the organization's information systems are secure and resilient against cyber threats.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Assessment of Current Cybersecurity Measures
Phase 2: Research of Latest Industry Standards and Best Practices
Phase 4: Review and Approval by Stakeholders
Phase 6: Periodic Review and Update of the Strategy
kpis: Number of vulnerabilities identified and mitigated
Time taken to respond to cybersecurity incidents
Stakeholder satisfaction with the implemented strategy
risks: Failure to adhere to new industry standards
Inadequate training for staff on updated policies
Lack of stakeholder engagement and support
